channel.title: Running your server efficiently
channel.description:
Is there a better or more efficient way to run your server than using Voule auto restarter?
Whenever I leave things running over night it seems the server always crashes. When I check things in the morning there's usually an "Unhandled error" message and Voule shuts down
The other problem I have with it is that when I check things after leaving for a few hours you can't login because it says your already logged in, please wait 60 seconds. When this happens I have to manually shut things down then restart, because technically the server is still running when this happens, so Voule just pops up with a screen saying port in use blah blah.
Basically, is there a better way I should be running my server?

item.title: Running your server efficiently
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Darkning:

my voule auto restarter closes out my client’s run.bat and my server’s run.bat

It closes your client because the restarter kills all java programs running on your computer, which includes your client, then it reopens a new runserver window.

Read full topic

my voule auto restarter closes out my client’s run.bat and my server’s run.bat
